en: And they ask you about the mountains,
so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
And He will leave it [i.e., the earth] a level plain;

ar: لَّا تَرَى فِيهَا عِوَجًا وَلَا أَمْتًا
en: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
That Day, they [i.e., everyone] will follow [the call of] the Caller
That Day, they [i.e., everyone] will follow [the call of] the Caller
and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful,
and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful,
so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].
